statements: UPDATE floor_plans SET building_id = 1, layout_image = E'\x71', access_control_points = '{"main_door": "secured", "balcony": "public"}' WHERE floor_id = 2
UPDATE floor_plans SET layout_image = E'\x49', access_control_points = '{"main_door": "restricted"}', building_id = 3 WHERE floor_id = 4
UPDATE floor_plans SET layout_image = E'\xDEADBEEF' WHERE floor_id = 1;
UPDATE floor_plans SET building_id = 2, access_control_points = '{"main":"entrance","secondary":"exit"}' WHERE floor_id = 3;
UPDATE FloorPlans SET floor_name = 'Main Lobby' WHERE floor_id = 1;
UPDATE AccessControlPoints SET access_level = 'Admin' WHERE access_point_id = 3;
UPDATE FloorPlans SET floor_name='Main Lobby' WHERE floor_id=1;
UPDATE AccessControlPoints SET access_level='Admin' WHERE location_id=2;
UPDATE FloorPlans SET floor_plan_image = 'new_image.jpg' WHERE floor_id = 1;
UPDATE AccessControlPoints SET accessibility = true, point_name = 'Main Entrance' WHERE point_id = 5;
UPDATE FloorPlans SET access_control_points = 'Main Entrance' WHERE floor_id = 1;
UPDATE BuildingLayouts SET floors = 10, building_name = 'Headquarters' WHERE layout_id = 1;
UPDATE FloorPlans SET image_url = 'new_image_url' WHERE p_id = 1;
UPDATE AccessControlPoints SET location = 'New Location', floor_id = 2 WHERE acp_id = 3;
UPDATE FloorPlans SET image_url = 'http://example.com/floor1.jpg' WHERE p_id = 1;
UPDATE AccessControlPoints SET location = 'Main Entrance' WHERE acp_id = 2;
UPDATE FloorPlans SET floor_layout = 'Open space with cubicles' WHERE floor_id = 1;
UPDATE BuildingLayouts SET total_floors = 12, construction_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE building_id = 2;
UPDATE FloorPlans SET floor_name = 'Main Floor', floor_layout = '{"layout": "open"}' WHERE floor_id = 1;
UPDATE AccessControlPoints SET access_type = 'Biometric', floor_id = 2 WHERE access_point_id = 3;
